name: DWhale Inc.
description: Developer of management software designed for the onboarding process. The company's software is an integrated growth platform that connects employee goals, feedback, and performance and allows goal alignment, enabling firms to optimize their performance management culture, and providing communication and leadership guides for effective performance management.

industry: Education, SaaS, Talent Management, HR Tech

name: YesBoss Group Indonesia PT
description: Developer of a conversational artificial intelligence development platform designed to help increase customer engagement through an understanding of human conversations. The company's natural language processing technology powers intelligent chatbots across different kinds of industries that can be leveraged for automated intelligent conversations in commonly used messaging channels, enabling clients to build their own chatbots on any messaging platform and help improve brand-audience customer engagement.

name: Walzay Inc.
description: Operator of a talent marketplace intended to provide full-time job opportunities with innovative companies and teams. The company allows candidates to explore opportunities around the world for in-office or remote roles, enabling candidates to avail an efficient hiring platform and companies to get suitable candidates for their job roles.
